entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
